input.sentences: the men are preparing for the wedding .
the bride is walking down the aisle .
the bride and groom exchange looks .
the bride talks with the grooms .
output.sentences: The groomsmen were all preparing for the wedding.
The mother of the bride is the one walking the bride down the aisle.
The  bride and groom exchanged their vows with a sweet look at each other.
Everyone stops to talk to the bride and groom to give their best wishes.
Afterwards everyone stopped to take wedding photos.
